entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023
